channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: We take a tour of a beachside home of international Model Deborah Hutton in Caulfield, an exclusive suburb of Melbourne.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Good Food Kitchen
channel.desc: Adam creates two chicken dishes and guest chef Claire cooks buttery goodness. Later some of Australia's best chefs show us some new recipes that we can bring to our kitchens.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: School Night Dinners
channel.desc: Nic and Ian cook up a one pot wonder meal that's simple and delicious and then they battle the hanger by cooking up some snacks.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Raw Vegan Not Gross
channel.desc: Laura adventures through Malibu with Guy Turland and excites our tastebuds with tomato soup and vegan pad thai.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs UK
channel.desc: Grand Designs UK, hosted by designer and writer Kevin McCloud, follows intrepid homebuilders as they pursue their architectural dreams.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: We discuss eco-friendly ways to get rid of pests in the garden, we show you how to make you own organic compost and we also bring you fruits and nuts varieties to plant.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Eyes for the Job
channel.desc: Chris Judge and Rebekah Higgs give tips for home improvement and accessibility tips.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: People seeking to get away from city life ask the experts to help them find their perfect country home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: We visit a remarkable house in beautiful Irene. We also speak to landscape designer Jan Blok who added considered green elements throughout the project.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Homes Revealed
channel.desc: On Luxury Homes Revealed, an incredible 10,000 square foot estate sits above the city in New York City. Templestowe, Australia has a beautiful home with a unique design and Beverly Hills, California has an impressive estate.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Styled
channel.desc: Styled follows the adventures of Nicole Babb and Caffery VanHorne, best friends and design experts working together in Nicole's family-run staging and interior design business.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: We take a tour of a beachside home of international Model Deborah Hutton in Caulfield, an exclusive suburb of Melbourne.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: We discuss eco-friendly ways to get rid of pests in the garden, we show you how to make you own organic compost and we also bring you fruits and nuts varieties to plant.
